content.raw:
For the task 5, looks good to me.

For the task3, a minor issue: maybe the orange color in our textures in not 'orange-enough' with respect to the original photo (see image) so people can find some problems related to computer vision algorithms. @nkoenig feel free to ignore if you don think it's not relevant enough.

![](http://i43.tinypic.com/no8o45.png)

For the task 5, looks good to me.
